Name: location
Description: Format 000_XXX. 000 is the distance (m) along the transect. XXX (I, II and III) indicate replicates in the east west direction (distance from transect 0, 10 and 20 m respectively)

Name: ctot
Description: From composite samples. Milled. analysed on EA IRMS

Name: ntot
Description: From composite samples. Milled. analysed on EA IRMS

Name: ptot
Description: Total P by acid digestion, analyzed with the molybdate blue method

Name: eoc
Description: TOC determined in 1M KCl extracts (2 g in 20 ml solution) analysed by TOC/TN Analyzer. Shimadzu

Name: en
Description: TN determined in 1M KCl extracts (2 g in 20 ml solution) analysed by TOC/TN Analyzer. Shimadzu

Name: olsenp
Description: Inorganic P determined in NaHCO3 extracts (0.5 M. pH 8.5. 2 g soil in 20 ml solution) - molybdate blue P determination

Name: cmic
Description: difference between TOC determined in CHCl3 fumigated KCl extracts and non-treated KCl extracts (see above. TOC/TN Analyzer. Shimadzu)

Name: nmic
Description: difference between TN determined in CHCl3 fumigated KCl extracts and non-treated KCl extracts (see above. TOC/TN Analyzer. Shimadzu)

Name: pmic
Description: difference between P determined in CHCl3 fumigated bicarbone extracts and non-treated bicarbonate extracts (see above. 0.5 M. pH 8.5 - molybdate-blue method)

Name: bg
Description: β-Glucosidase activity analyzed from fresh samples in flourimetric assy with 4-Methylumbelliferyl β-D-glucopyranoside

Name: nag
Description: N-acetyl-β-D-glucosaminidase activity analyzed in fresh samples in fluorimetric assay 4-Methylumbelliferyl N-acetyl-β-D-glucosaminide

Name: phos
Description: Phosphatase activity analyzed from fresh samples in flourimetric assy with 4-Methylumbelliferyl phosphate salt
